Source code for src.controllers.register

"""Handle Register model to be used in the application

"""
from datetime import datetime
from typing import Tuple

from ..models.register import Register as _Register



[docs]class Register:
    """class to handle the register model
    Attributes:
        get_last_record_by_username (method)
        exists (method)
        update_at_user_creation (method)
    """


[docs]    @staticmethod
    async def get_last_record_by_username(
        username: str, to_dict: bool = False
    ) -> _Register:
        """Get the last record of a user

        Args:
            username (str): The username of the user
            to_dict (bool, optional): If the result should be a dict. Defaults to False.
        Returns:
            _Register: The last record of the user
        """
        record = await _Register.read.by_username(
            username=username, last_record=True, to_dict=to_dict
        )
        if to_dict:
            return _Register.to_dict(record)
        return record



[docs]    @staticmethod
    async def exists(username: str) -> bool:
        """Check if the user exists

        Args:
            username (str): The username of the user

        Returns:
            bool: True if the user exists
        """
        record = await Register.get_last_record_by_username(username)
        print("Aqui", record)
        if record is None:
            return False
        if datetime.now() > record.expiration_date:
            return record.status
        return True



[docs]    @staticmethod
    async def update_at_user_creation(
        _uuid: str,
    ) -> Tuple[str or None, str or None, str or None]:
        """Update the register when the user is created

        Args:
            _uuid (str): The uuid of the user
        Returns:
            response (Tuple): Tuple[str or None, str or None, str or None], The username, the email and the password of the user
        """
        record = await _Register.read.by_uuid(_uuid)
        if record is None:
            return None, None, None
        if not record.status:
            return None, None, None
        response = await _Register.update(
            record.id,
            data=dict(
                status=False,
                expiration_date=datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
            ),
        )
        if not response:
            return None, None, None
        return record.username, record.first_name, record.last_name
